review: I got this tone replace a broken chromecast, and I'm so glad I did.

review: After using it for about a month, I can say it is an excellent product, previously used the connection to my Smart TV Panasonic, the access was not very fast compared to Fire TV which is pretty fast in the process of selection of the movies is pretty good. I can also control my FIRE TV with my mobile galaxy S5 just download the application, this is incredible!.
author: Glenn Olivo "Icegle"

review: This works great.  I am a Roku fan and it works just as well.  Not good for gesDue to the remote.  Roku remote resembles a gameController, Fite Stick does not. Makes it terribly difficult to play games.

review: Love it! It has totally replaced our Apple TV. We love amazon prime video too which this makes super easy to use. It also has Plex, which is a huge plus!

review: Terrible picture, its like an old VHS. Yes, have checked settings. Sound is off too (lips move different than video).Just get the fire box or the apple tv.
